item.title: Simplify Your Cloud Migration Journey with Azure Migrate
item.description: Streamlining the Migration to Azure Azure Migrate provides a comprehensive solution to simplify your journey to the cloud. This powerful service offers a range of tools and capabilities to help you assess, migrate, and modernize your on-premises infrastructure, data, and applications. Unified Migration Platform Azure Migrate acts as a single portal to start, run, and track your migration to Azure. It provides a seamless experience, allowing you to manage the entire migration process from a centralized location.
